info.name: Link editor
info.summary: An app to read and edit .URL and .webloc files.
info.description:
### External web links in Nextcloud! * ✍️ **create and edit** .URL and .webloc links in the file view * 🌍 **open links** by clicking them and confirming you want to go to the external site * 📤 **works in public shares** so you can share links easily with others * 🔄 **sync your links** as .URL and .webloc are web links as created on most operating systems.
#### Latest changes 🎉 **1.1.9, 21. March 2022** - Add Czech localization (thanks to @p-bo) - Update JS dependencies, fixes [a potential XSS-vulnerability in the URL sanitizer](https://github.com/te-online/files_linkeditor/pull/65)
_[View changelog for older versions](https://github.com/te-online/files_linkeditor#changelog)_
info.author: Thomas Ebert
